forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 50. Southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the city basks in the gentle embrace of a sunny morning, with temperatures poised to rise to around 64 degrees. The west wind whispers softly, providing a refreshing touch against the warmth of the sun. The clarity of the day is striking, with an unobstructed view of the horizon, revealing the iconic contours of the Golden Gate Bridge and the distant peaks beyond. The absence of fog allows for an immersive experience of the cityscape, every detail sharper, every color a touch more vibrant.

As the day progresses, expect a delightful warmth, inviting strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a leisurely visit to one of the local cafes where light conversations mingle with the aroma of fresh coffee. Dressing in layers is advisable to embrace the coolness of the evening, when temperatures will settle around a comfortable 50 degrees under a blanket of stars and serenity. Whether you choose to wander through the bustling streets or find a quiet nook to reflect, today offers the perfect backdrop for appreciating the charm of this coastal city.
